TopicTitle: Found out what causes a bug!

Articles.Content:
I have talked about the control bug a lot (down becomes up and up is still up and in other cases left is left and right is left) and it really annoys me. Could've saved 30 minutes from the yesterday Duna suffering...

So, it has to do something with RCS and any atmosphere. Any ideas on how to fix it?

Pls Blitworks, pls fix it

Are you saying that if you don’t touch the analog sticks at all, thing are fine?

i can think of two scenarios:

1) The analog sticks on your controller where already pressed a direction when you turned the console on and they are not calibrated correctly as a result and causing issues because of that. 

2) You have the camera positioned in such a way that you got confused with the orientation of the camera and think it is sitting different than it actually is (which can happen fairly easily in a game like this where space isn’t always the easiest place to reorient yourself.)
